name: Consumer Credit Association of the United Kingdom
goal:
The CCA is a not-for-profit organisation representing the Home Credit industry in the UK and Ireland. Promoting high standards of business and consumer relations. Around 400 member firms ranging from large public companies to
sole traders conducting business in their local communities.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives:
The CCA represents the interests of the home credit industry and as such provides the industry’s views on
current and upcoming EU initiatives impacting the industry, including financial services and consumer
protection policy.
